analyses.title: Performance Analysis by Demographics
analyses.context: Analyze how demographic factors relate to student performance in math, reading, and writing.

sub_analyses.title: Gender-Based Performance
sub_analyses.why: Understand the performance differences in math, reading, and writing scores between male and female students.
answers: Average scores in math, reading, and writing by gender.
code_lines: # Group by gender and calculate the mean of math, reading, and writing scores

sub_analyses.title: Race/Ethnicity-Based Performance
sub_analyses.why: Determine performance variations across different race/ethnicity groups.
answers: Average scores in math, reading, and writing by race/ethnicity.
code_lines: # Group by race/ethnicity and calculate the mean of math, reading, and writing scores

sub_analyses.title: Parental Education Impact on Performance
sub_analyses.why: Investigate the influence of a parent's educational level on student performance.
answers: Average scores in math, reading, and writing by parental education level.
code_lines: # Group by parental level of education and calculate the mean of math, reading, and writing scores
result = students_performance.groupby('parental level of education')[['math score', 'reading score', 'writing score']].mean().reset_index()

analyses.title: Effect of Test Preparation on Performance
analyses.context: Analyze the effect of test preparation course participation on student scores.

sub_analyses.title: Test Preparation Course Performance Comparison
sub_analyses.why: Evaluate how completing a test preparation course influences performance in math, reading, and writing.
answers: Average scores in math, reading, and writing by test preparation course completion status.
code_lines: # Group by test preparation course status and calculate the mean of math, reading, and writing scores
result = students_performance.groupby('test preparation course')[['math score', 'reading score', 'writing score']].mean().reset_index()
